title: Modal API - Modal - Modal Props
content:
<PropName
  name="slug"
  type="string"
  required
/>
A unique identifier for this modal.
<PropName
  name="closeOnBlur"
  type="boolean"
/>
Will close the modal when the user clicks outside of it. Defaults to true.
<PropName
  name="lockBodyScroll"
  type="boolean"
/>
Will prevent the document from scrolling while the modal is open. Defaults to true.
<ClassPrefix />
{/*
<PropName
  name="callbacks"
  type="method"
/>
These methods still need documentation: onOpen
  onClose
  onEnter
  onEntered
  onEntering
  onExit
  onExiting
  onExited
  openOnInit */}
<BasicProps
  defaultElement='dialog'
  idPrefix='modal'
/>
</JumplistNode>
<JumplistNode nodeID="toggler">
